content: "Hey Gabby, I just wanted to reach out and say how much I enjoyed our first date. You were definitely the highlight of my week and I have been smiling ever since. I was also impressed by your quick wit and sense of humor. You have the unique ability to light up a room with your laughter, and I feel so lucky to have you as my friend. I'd love to continue this connection and explore more of what life has to offer. Would you be up for a second date with me this weekend?"
